mbanama deshayaka diyunuwa gaurawaya ha kirthiya ema deshawasingeth palakayangeth aprathihatha dhairyaye lulaya bawa amathaka nokala yuthuya.des wides pathala suwisal kirthi namayata himikam kiyana kirthinamaya purayata gena dunathitha rachawaru saha rachiniyo saha pradeshiya nayakayo daha ata deneki.palakayan athara samahara palakayan wishishtanayoya.athamhu durwalayoya.ee ee wshishtathwaya owun labagena aththe swakiya deshaye swadhinathwaya ha unnathiya udesa jiwithaya paraduwata thaba kapawimeni.kapawime dharmathawaya matha shreshta pudgalayo bihiwethi.polonnaruwa rajadhaniya krara lesath sahasika lesath winasha karanu labuwe kalingha magha wisini.me palaka palikawan siyalu gema yahapath ho ayahapath palana thanthrayehi mathakayan polonnaru puraya ha thadasanna pradeshawala ithiriwa athath wadath wadagath aithihasika mehewarak kala rajun dedena wanne cholayingen rata mudawagath [[“maha wijayabahu rajathuma”]] saha bheda bhinnawu abhyanthara deshapalanaya jaya gena rata paksesath kala “maha parakramabahu rajathumaya” aithihasika sadhaka walata anuwa ,sahithyayata anuwa, janaprawada walata anuwa rajakiya nagarayak pradhana washayen kotas kihipayakin sadumladdak wiya.
